    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stone Face](/Feats.aspx?ID=2369) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Through conditioning or experience, you've mastered the art of composure, even in the face of fear. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against effects with the [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) trait, and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Will DC against [Intimidate](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) skill actions, such as [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53).
